recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese.
Combine all ingredients and season with pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill chicken and slice.
Toss lettuce with dressing.
Top with chicken and croutons.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, topped with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a variety of fresh vegetables.
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger, add soy sauce.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Smoothie
recipes.description: A refreshing smoothie made with Greek yogurt and fresh fruit.
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Top dough with ingredients and bake at 475°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.description: A traditional dessert with a flaky crust and spiced apple filling.
instructions: Prepare crust, fill with apple mixture, and bake at 375°F for 50-60 minutes.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A nutritious salad with quinoa, cucumbers, tomatoes, and a lemon vinaigrette.
instructions: Cook quinoa and mix with chopped vegetables and dressing.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Tender beef in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles.
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms, add cream, and serve over noodles.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta dish with grilled chicken and Alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta, top with chicken and sauce.

recipes.name: Caesar Wrap
recipes.description: A wrap filled with Caesar salad ingredients and grilled chicken.
instructions: Fill tortilla with salad ingredients and wrap.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa
recipes.description: A fresh salsa made with mango, red onion, and cilantro.
instructions: Mix diced mango with chopped onion and cilantro, and squeeze lime juice over it.

recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: A spicy Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.
instructions: Simmer shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass with chili paste.

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.description: Deep-fried balls made from chickpeas and spices.
instructions: Blend ingredients, form into balls, and fry until golden brown.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Shrimp cooked in a garlic butter sauce, served over pasta.
instructions: Cook shrimp in butter and garlic, serve over pasta.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A moist and sweet bread made with ripe bananas.
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

recipes.name: Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: A whole chicken seasoned and roasted until crispy.
instructions: Season chicken, roast at 375°F for 1-1.5 hours.

recipes.name: Chia Seed Pudding
recipes.description: A creamy and nutritious pudding made from chia seeds and milk.
instructions: Mix ingredients and refrigerate overnight.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with a savory mixture of rice, meat, and vegetables.
instructions: Stuff peppers with mixture, bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy lemon bars with a buttery crust.
instructions: Prepare crust, bake, then top with lemon filling and bake again.

recipes.name: Buffalo Wings
recipes.description: Spicy chicken wings served with a tangy sauce.
instructions: Fry wings, toss with sauce, and serve with celery sticks.

recipes.name: Beef Chili
recipes.description: A hearty and spicy chili made with ground beef and beans.
instructions: Cook beef, add beans and tomatoes, and season with chili powder.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadillas
recipes.description: Tortillas filled with chicken and cheese, grilled to perfection.
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese, grill until crispy.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and butter.
instructions: Mix ingredients, cook on griddle, and serve with syrup.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: A comforting soup made with ripe tomatoes and fresh basil.
instructions: Simmer tomatoes and onion, blend with basil and cream.

recipes.name: Crispy Tofu
recipes.description: Tofu pieces coated in a crispy breading and baked.
instructions: Coat tofu in breadcrumbs, bake until crispy.

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: Pasta tossed with fresh vegetables and a light sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with sautéed vegetables and sauce.

recipes.name: Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: A thick smoothie served in a bowl and topped with fruit and granola.
instructions: Blend fruit and yogurt, pour into a bowl, and top with granola.

recipes.name: Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.description: A savory pie filled with chicken and vegetables in a creamy sauce.
instructions: Prepare filling, cover with crust, and bake until golden brown.

recipes.name: Beet Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad made with roasted beets, goat cheese, and walnuts.
instructions: Combine roasted beets with cheese, walnuts, and dressing.

recipes.name: Ratatouille
recipes.description: A French vegetable stew made with zucchini, eggplant, and tomatoes.
instructions: Sauté vegetables with herbs until tender.

recipes.name: Chia Seed Pudding
recipes.description: A creamy dessert made with chia seeds, coconut milk, and fruit.
instructions: Mix chia seeds with coconut milk and refrigerate overnight. Top with fruit before serving.

recipes.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Mushrooms stuffed with a savory mixture of breadcrumbs, cheese, and herbs.
instructions: Stuff mushrooms with mixture and bake until golden brown.

recipes.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
recipes.description: A creamy dip made with spinach, artichokes, and cheese, perfect for parties.
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake until bubbly, and serve with chips or bread.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Fries
recipes.description: Crispy fries made from sweet potatoes, seasoned and baked.
instructions: Cut potatoes into fries, season, and bake until crispy.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and delicious toast topped with mashed avocado and seasoning.
instructions: Toast bread, spread avocado, and season with lemon and salt.

recipes.name: Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.description: Sweet rolls with a cinnamon-sugar filling and cream cheese icing.
instructions: Prepare dough, roll with cinnamon filling, bake, and ice.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Soup
recipes.description: A creamy soup made with pumpkin and warm spices.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add pumpkin, blend with cream.

recipes.name: Berry Smoothie
recipes.description: A refreshing smoothie made with mixed berries and yogurt.
instructions: Blend ingredients until smooth.

recipes.name: Chicken Satay
recipes.description: Grilled chicken skewers served with a savory peanut sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken, grill on skewers, and serve with peanut sauce.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy risotto with sautéed mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook rice slowly with broth, add mushrooms and cheese.

recipes.name: Peach Cobbler
recipes.description: A sweet dessert with peaches and a biscuit topping.
instructions: Prepare peach filling, top with biscuit dough, and bake.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded eggplant slices baked with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Bread and bake eggplant, top with sauce and cheese, and bake again.

recipes.name: Baked Ziti
recipes.description: A hearty pasta dish with ziti, marinara sauce, and melted cheese.
instructions: Combine cooked ziti with sauce and meat, top with cheese, and bake.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A nutritious soup made with lentils, carrots, and celery.
instructions: Simmer lentils with vegetables and broth until tender.

recipes.name: Bulgur Salad
recipes.description: A light salad made with bulgur wheat, herbs, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook bulgur and mix with chopped vegetables and herbs.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
recipes.description: Crispy bread topped with garlic butter and herbs.
instructions: Spread butter and garlic on bread, bake until crispy.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Tender beef strips cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce.
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms, add cream and seasonings, and serve over noodles.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Combine ingredients and toss with olive oil and herbs.
